thread.section_title: Gift Card Granny Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gift Card Granny | www.giftcardgranny.com | 5 of 12
thread.title: Jay
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Jay

author: Jay
title: Jay
text: Gives you a complete perspective of what gift cards are available without having to search multiple websites. Gift Card Granny scrubs all the gift card websites for you and alerts you of the best deals! The icing on the cake is the Gift Card Granny reward program- you get points towards free gift cards when making purchases on the website!
